backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with authorization, blob storage mixins, and comprehensive types for users, master data, dynamic forms, tasks, and SLAs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old task structures to the new Task format by transforming attached form IDs into structured attachment objects.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend utility modules, components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining design tokens, theme variables, and light/dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the application router, route tree, and global providers including authentication wrapper and theming.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied message with a button to navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button using Internet Identity to log in or out, clearing React Query cache when logging out.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Renders a modal for collecting and saving a user's name, email, and department with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Checks if the caller is an admin and either renders children, a loading state, or an access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Ensures the user is authenticated and has a profile, showing login UI or profile setup before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/forms/DynamicFor: Dynamically renders form fields based on a form definition and submits collected form data.
frontend/src/components/forms/FieldDefin: Displays and edits a single form field definition including label, type, validation, and lookup options.
frontend/src/components/forms/fields/Fil: Handles file selection, simulated upload progress, and removal, returning file metadata and bytes.
frontend/src/components/forms/FormDefini: Provides UI to edit a form's name and manage its list of fields, including adding, updating, reordering, and removing fields.
frontend/src/components/forms/Submission: Displays submitted form values using the form definition, formatting file, array, and primitive values.
Provides the main layout with sidebar navigation, admin/user sections, header, and footer around page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/NavSectio: Renders a sidebar navigation section with labeled menu items and active-state handling.
frontend/src/components/masters/FixedMas: Reusable CRUD component for fixed master data with dialogs for create/update and a table for listing items.
frontend/src/components/masters/MasterLi: Editor for user-defined master lists, allowing creation, editing, and deletion of lists and their items.
frontend/src/components/tasks/PickupTask: Button that triggers a task pickup mutation and shows success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/tasks/ReassignTa: Dialog for reassigning a task to a user or department with form inputs and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/SlaStatusB: Displays a badge indicating SLA status such as on-track, at-risk, or breached.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormsP: Shows a list of task-attached forms with completion status and actions to fill or view submissions.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormSu: Dialog for loading a form definition and submitting task-related form data via a dynamic renderer.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskJourne: Displays a vertical timeline of task journey events with timestamps, actions, and user info.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskListTa: Renders a table of tasks with status, priority, assignment, dates, form progress, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/hooks/forms/useFormDefiniti: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, create, update, and delete form definitions via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/forms/useFormSubmissi: Contains hooks for retrieving and submitting form submissions, including data conversion from backend formats.
frontend/src/hooks/forms/useLookupOption: Fetches lookup options for master data types, currently returning empty results pending backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/masterData/useMasterD: Retrieves master data such as task types, priorities, statuses, departments, categories, and master lists from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/masters/useMasters.ts: Defines placeholder query and mutation hooks for master data management, pending backend query implementations.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks/useAssignmentAc: Provides task pickup and reassignment mutation hooks and triggers related query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks/useTaskDefiniti: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and updating tasks using the actor API with cache invalidation.
Fetches a task's audit log and maps it into simplified journey events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the authenticated identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the caller's user profile, role, and admin status through actor-backed queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity restoration via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a mutation hook to save the caller’s user profile and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/FormBuilderPage: Admin page for creating, editing, and deleting form definitions with validation and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MastersPage.tsx: Admin UI for managing master data lists using CRUD hooks and tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/TaskDefinitions: Admin page placeholder showing empty task definitions and disabled create/edit/delete actions.
Task creation form allowing users to attach forms and submit a new task to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/tasks/DepartmentPoolP: Displays tasks available to a department using a shared task pool table.
frontend/src/pages/tasks/FormSubmissionV: Loads a form submission and its definition for viewing, with navigation back to the task.
frontend/src/pages/tasks/MyTasksPage.tsx: Shows tasks assigned to the current user using a task list table.
Displays full task details, attached forms, journey events, and actions like pickup and reassign.
frontend/src/utils/formDefinitionEncodin: Utilities for normalizing form definitions and fields for backend compatibility and converting field types to strings.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Converts unknown error values into readable messages with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/navMatch.ts: Determines active navigation state based on path matching rules and predefined app routes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, container settings, and loads typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, including version, feature summaries, architectural notes, and known issues related to the task and form management application.
